SELECT SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER (MEMBER_NUMBER,MEMBER_EMAIL,MEMBER_NICKNAME,MEMBER_INTERESTS) VALUES (#{memberNumber},#{memberEmail},#{memberNickname},#{memberInterests})
mapper.select: SELECT STUDY_NUMBER, STUDY_CATEGORY, STUDY_START, STUDY_PERSONNEL, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_APPROVE, STUDY_VIEWS, ts.STUDY_MEMBER_NUMBER, tm.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_STUDY ts JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON ts.STUDY_MEMBER_NUMBER = tm.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE tm.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber}

SELECT NVL(STUDY_DATA, 0) FROM( SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN ts.STUDY_APPROVE = '0' THEN 1 END) AS STUDY_DATA FROM TBL_STUDY ts JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON ts.STUDY_MEMBER_NUMBER = tm.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber} )

SELECT NVL(STUDY_DATA, 0) FROM( SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN ts.STUDY_APPROVE = '1' THEN 1 END) AS STUDY_DATA FROM TBL_STUDY ts JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON ts.STUDY_MEMBER_NUMBER = tm.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber} )

SELECT RN, POST_NUMBER, POST_CATEGORY, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, POST_VIEWS, POST_REGISTER_DATE, POST_UPDATE_DATE, POST_MEMBER_NUMBER, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, POST_NUMBER, POST_CATEGORY, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, POST_VIEWS, POST_REGISTER_DATE, POST_UPDATE_DATE, tp.POST_MEMBER_NUMBER, tm.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_POST tp JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON tp.POST_MEMBER_NUMBER = tm.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE tm.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber} AND ROWNUM <= #{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.amount} ) WHERE RN > ((#{criteria.pageNum} -1) * #{criteria.amount}) ORDER BY POST_NUMBER DESC
SELECT COUNT(tp.POST_NUMBER) FROM TBL_POST tp JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON tp.POST_MEMBER_NUMBER = tm.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber}
